channel.title: The Basics
channel.description:
Hello, me and my friend Heartless have been playing MS together for about a month now, and Heartless has finally made a server, but now we Dont know the Basics of adding NPC's WITH options eg. trading, etc..
So i was just wondering if any of you could help us out.. Or possst anything to help, thankssssss

item.title: The Basics
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Sacuv:

where ius client.java i downloaded mod tharok’s quick and easy server maker it wud b good if he cud answer or any1 else cud tell me ?

click on the source you chose…
and inside you might see alot of files…
client.java is one of em

item.title: The Basics
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Try adding to your autp spawn npc 555,
go into client.java and search aubury rune shop
add under it

				} else if (NPCID == 555) { //Name
					PutNPCCoords = true;
					WanneShop = 50; //dec?

NOW! go into shops.cfg and do this

shop = 50	Random_Stuff					2	2	6137	10	6139	10	6141	10	6147	10	6153	10	7386	10	7390	10	7394	10

ftw

Read full topic
